title: Ep 41: Father’s Day Ep, Poop Inspecting & First Ever Guest
itunes:title: Ep 41: Father’s Day Ep, Poop Inspecting & First Ever Guest
description:
Today, this is what's important:

How certain colors make you feel, the name Simone, the Floyd Mayweather / Logan Paul boxing match, pinworm, lice, Ace Ventura impressions, drag shows, tanning, swimming, and more. Also Adam's dad pops in as the first ever guest on the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
